content: #32892 formalises the arithmetic-geometric mean. I did a Zulip search and it apparently has never came up before
There was #mathlib4 > Help wanted: proof in `Nat.nthRoot` @ ðŸ’¬, but I do not know of its current status.

Damiano Testa said:

There was #mathlib4 > Help wanted: proof in `Nat.nthRoot` @ ðŸ’¬, but I do not know of its current status.

There are now 3 proofs for the nthRoot problem, and I'm not sure which one is best but one has a PR open #31492
Does it help define the arithmetic-geometric mean somehow? I'm not seeing nthRoot used anywhere in it
Sorry, I was misremembering: what I linked is a proof that avoids the AM-GM mean!

However, I think that AM-GM inequality is in this file: https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Analysis/MeanInequalities.html#Real.geom_mean_le_arith_mean.

EDIT: I was always thinking of the inequality, not of the AG mean! Sorry for the noise.
#32892 is now ready for review again
